plans.title: Sakura Plan
plans.description: Ideal for those taking their first steps in the digital world

items.title: Platforms
items.description: Instagram, Facebook, and TikTok

items.title: Content
items.description: Focus on hooks that capture attention within the first 3 seconds. Use of viral content to encourage interactions.

items.title: Acquisition Strategy
items.description: Setup of a low-budget campaign on Facebook/Instagram Ads to drive traffic of interest to the profile.

items.title: Basic Ads
items.description: Low-budget campaign on Facebook/Instagram Ads.

items.title: Monthly Data Analysis
items.description: Simple report on follower growth, engagement (likes, comments, shares), and basic audience analysis.

plans.title: Fuji Plan
plans.description: For brands that have already begun their journey and need an additional boost

items.title: Covered Platforms
items.description: Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn

items.title: Content
items.description: 20 monthly posts (5 per week), including short videos like reels/TikTok and graphics to increase reach.

items.title: More Advanced Ads
items.description: Retargeting campaigns to maximize conversions from those interacting with organic posts.

items.title: Lead Generation
items.description: Use of integrated forms in ads to capture potential client information.

items.title: Profile Optimization
items.description: Review and optimization of bios and descriptions to improve the conversion of visitors into followers/clients.

items.title: More Detailed Monthly Analysis
items.description: Reports with key metrics (CPC, CTR, leads generated) and improvement suggestions.

plans.inspiration: Inspired by the great samurai leaders
plans.title: Bushido Plan
plans.description: Perfect for those seeking solid market leadership

items.title: Covered Platforms
items.description: Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, Google Ads.

items.title: Content
items.description: 25 monthly posts, with a mix of educational content, social proof (testimonials, success stories), and high-impact promotions.

items.title: Multichannel Ads
items.description: Setup and optimization of remarketing campaigns and ads on Google and social networks focused on conversion and sales closure.

items.title: Sales Funnel
items.description: Creation and optimization of automatic sales funnels, from lead generation to the final sale, applying scarcity, urgency, and social proof principles.

items.title: Email Marketing
items.description: Setup of automated sequences to nurture leads, increasing the conversion of those who haven't made a decision yet.

items.title: Constant Optimization
items.description: Weekly campaign analysis and continuous adjustments to maximize ROI.

plans.title: Tenka Plan
plans.description: Designed for those who want to dominate the market

items.title: Covered Platforms
items.description: All of the above, plus YouTube and podcasting to generate industry authority.

items.title: Content
items.description: Collaboration with micro-influencers and brand ambassadors to amplify reach.

items.title: Influence Marketing
items.description: Collaboration with micro-influencers and brand ambassadors to amplify reach.

items.title: Aggressive Ad Campaigns
items.description: Significant budget for campaigns across multiple platforms, with constant A/B testing to ensure the most effective creatives are always active.

items.title: Sales Funnel Optimization
items.description: Sales funnels with intensive follow-up and multiple touchpoints, from ads to email marketing, webinars, and remarketing.

items.title: Advanced Data Analysis
items.description: Weekly reports of all metrics, focusing on lifetime value (LTV), customer acquisition cost (CAC), and strategies to improve retention.

header.title: Revolutionize Your Digital Strategy
header.subtitle: Apply the Kaizen method and start standing out

slides.title: About Us
slides.text: We are a team passionate about continuous improvement, dedicated to offering digital strategies that adapt to your needs and evolve with you.

slides.title: Our Goal
slides.text: We help you achieve your goals, improving every step of your digital journey so that you grow sustainably and efficiently.

slides.title: Our Philosophy
slides.text: We apply the Kaizen method to drive constant innovation in every project, ensuring results that stand out in a competitive digital environment.

items.title: Analysis and Strategy
items.text: We will perform a thorough analysis of the market, competitors, and audience to design a personalized digital strategy that drives your brand and meets your goals.

items.title: Presentation of Drafts
items.text: We will develop prototypes and sketches of campaigns and content so you can visualize the creative approach and ensure it aligns with your vision and objectives before moving forward.

items.title: Content Creation and Execution
items.text: We will create high-impact visual, written, and multimedia content, launching advertising campaigns on key platforms like Google, Facebook, and more, ensuring that every action maximizes your presence and connects with your audience.

items.title: Results Analysis
items.text: We will monitor the performance of campaigns and provide detailed reports to assess the impact, making adjustments to maximize return on investment.
